<script async="true" type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
	var host = window.location.hostname;
	var element = document.createElement('script');
	var firstScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
	var url = 'https://quantcast.mgr.consensu.org'
	    .concat('/choice/', 'XwNYEpNeFfhfr', '/', host, '/choice.js')
	var uspTries = 0;
	var uspTriesLimit = 3;
	element.async = true;
	element.type = 'text/javascript';
	element.src = url;
	
	firstScript.parentNode.insertBefore(element, firstScript);
	
	function makeStub() {
	    var TCF_LOCATOR_NAME = '__tcfapiLocator';
	    var queue = [];
	    var win = window;
	    var cmpFrame;
	    
	    function addFrame() {
		var doc = win.document;
		var otherCMP = !!(win.frames[TCF_LOCATOR_NAME]);
		
		if (!otherCMP) {
		    if (doc.body) {
			var iframe = doc.createElement('iframe');
			
			iframe.style.cssText = 'display:none';
			iframe.name = TCF_LOCATOR_NAME;
			doc.body.appendChild(iframe);
		    } else {
			setTimeout(addFrame, 5);
		    }
		}
		return !otherCMP;
	    }
	    
	    function tcfAPIHandler() {
		var gdprApplies;
		var args = arguments;
		
		if (!args.length) {
		    return queue;
		} else if (args[0] === 'setGdprApplies') {
		    if (
			args.length > 3 &&
			    args[2] === 2 &&
			    typeof args[3] === 'boolean'
		    ) {
			gdprApplies = args[3];
			if (typeof args[2] === 'function') {
			    args[2]('set', true);
			}
		    }
		} else if (args[0] === 'ping') {
		    var retr = {
			gdprApplies: gdprApplies,
			cmpLoaded: false,
			cmpStatus: 'stub'
		    };
		    
		    if (typeof args[2] === 'function') {
			args[2](retr);
		    }
		} else {
		    queue.push(args);
		}
	    }
	    
	    function postMessageEventHandler(event) {
		var msgIsString = typeof event.data === 'string';
		var json = {};
		
		try {
		    if (msgIsString) {
			json = JSON.parse(event.data);
		    } else {
			json = event.data;
		    }
		} catch (ignore) {}
		
		var payload = json.__tcfapiCall;
		
		if (payload) {
		    window.__tcfapi(
			payload.command,
			payload.version,
			function(retValue, success) {
			    var returnMsg = {
				__tcfapiReturn: {
				    returnValue: retValue,
				    success: success,
				    callId: payload.callId
				}
			    };
			    if (msgIsString) {
				returnMsg = JSON.stringify(returnMsg);
			    }
			    event.source.postMessage(returnMsg, '*');
			},
			payload.parameter
		    );
		}
	    }
	    
	    while (win) {
		try {
		    if (win.frames[TCF_LOCATOR_NAME]) {
			cmpFrame = win;
			break;
		    }
		} catch (ignore) {}
		
		if (win === window.top) {
		    break;
		}
		win = win.parent;
	    }
	    if (!cmpFrame) {
		addFrame();
		win.__tcfapi = tcfAPIHandler;
		win.addEventListener('message', postMessageEventHandler, false);
	    }
	};
	
	makeStub();
	
	var uspStubFunction = function() {
	    var arg = arguments;
	    if (typeof window.__uspapi !== uspStubFunction) {
		setTimeout(function() {
		    if (typeof window.__uspapi !== 'undefined') {
			window.__uspapi.apply(window.__uspapi, arg);
		    }
		}, 500);
	    }
	};
	
	var checkIfUspIsReady = function() {
	    uspTries++;
	    if (window.__uspapi === uspStubFunction && uspTries < uspTriesLimit) {
		console.warn('USP is not accessible');
	    } else {
		clearInterval(uspInterval);
	    }
	};
	
	if (typeof window.__uspapi === 'undefined') {
	    window.__uspapi = uspStubFunction;
	    var uspInterval = setInterval(checkIfUspIsReady, 6000);
	}
    })();
</script>

    else { el_button.classList.add('show');  }
}

<colgroup><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/></colgroup>
<thead>
<tr>
<th aria-label="Tm" class=" poptip sort_default_asc show_partial_when_sorting center" data-stat="team_ID" scope="col">Tm</th>
<th aria-label=" Number of Players used in Games " class=" poptip center" data-stat="batters_used" data-tip="<strong>Number of Players used in Games</strong>" scope="col">#Bat</th>
<th aria-label=" Batters&#x2019; average age Weighted by AB + Games Played" class=" poptip sort_default_asc center" data-stat="age_bat" data-tip="<strong>Batters&#x2019; average age</strong><br>Weighted by AB + Games Played" scope="col">BatAge</th>
<th aria-label="Runs Scored/Game" class=" poptip center" data-stat="runs_per_game" data-tip="Runs Scored Per Game" scope="col">R/G</th>
<th aria-label="Games Played" class=" poptip center" data-stat="G" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" scope="col">G</th>
<th aria-label="Plate Appearances" class=" poptip center" data-stat="PA" data-tip="<strong>Plate Appearances</strong><br>When available, we use actual plate appearances from play-by-play game accounts<br>Otherwise estimated using AB + BB + HBP + SF + SH,<br>which excludes catcher interferences.<br>When <span class=tooltip>this color</span> click for a summary of each PA." scope="col">PA</th>
<th aria-label="At Bats" class=" poptip center" data-stat="AB" data-tip="At Bats" scope="col">AB</th>
<th aria-label="Runs Scored" class=" poptip center" data-stat="R" data-tip="Runs Scored/Allowed" scope="col">R</th>
<th aria-label="Hits" class=" poptip center" data-stat="H" data-tip="Hits/Hits Allowed" scope="col">H</th>
<th aria-label="Doubles" class=" poptip center" data-stat="2B" scope="col">2B</th>
<th aria-label="Triples" class=" poptip center" data-stat="3B" scope="col">3B</th>
<th aria-label="Home Runs" class=" poptip center" data-stat="HR" data-tip="Home Runs Hit/Allowed" scope="col">HR</th>
<th aria-label="Runs Batted In" class=" poptip center" data-stat="RBI" data-tip="Runs Batted In" scope="col">RBI</th>
<th aria-label="Stolen Bases" class=" poptip center" data-stat="SB" data-tip="Stolen Bases" scope="col">SB</th>
<th aria-label="Caught Stealing" class=" poptip center" data-stat="CS" data-tip="Caught Stealing" scope="col">CS</th>
<th aria-label="Bases on Balls" class=" poptip center" data-stat="BB" data-tip="Bases on Balls/Walks" scope="col">BB</th>
<th aria-label="Strikeouts" class=" poptip center" data-stat="SO" data-tip="Strikeouts" scope="col">SO</th>
<th aria-label="Batting Average" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" data-tip='<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class="all_time_record">Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year.' scope="col">BA</th>
<th aria-label="On-Base%" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" scope="col">OBP</th>
<th aria-label="Slugging %" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" scope="col">SLG</th>
<th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played" scope="col">OPS</th>
<th aria-label="Adjusted OPS+" class=" poptip hide_non_quals center" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_plus" data-tip="<strong>OPS+</strong><br>100*[OBP/lg OBP + SLG/lg SLG - 1]<br>Adjusted to the player&#x2019;s ballpark(s)" scope="col">OPS+</th>
<th aria-label="Total Bases" class=" poptip center" data-stat="TB" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs." scope="col">TB</th>
<th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" class=" poptip center" data-stat="GIDP" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's." scope="col">GDP</th>
<th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" class=" poptip center" data-stat="HBP" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch." scope="col">HBP</th>
<th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" class=" poptip center" data-stat="SH" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)" scope="col">SH</th>
<th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" class=" poptip center" data-stat="SF" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954." scope="col">SF</th>
<th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" class=" poptip center" data-stat="IBB" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955." scope="col">IBB</th>
<th aria-label="Runners Left On Base" class=" poptip center" data-stat="LOB" data-tip="Runners Left On Base" scope="col">LOB</th>
</tr>

<th aria-label="Runs Batted In" class=" center" data-stat="RBI" data-tip="Runs Batted In">RBI</th>
<th aria-label="Stolen Bases" class=" center" data-stat="SB" data-tip="Stolen Bases">SB</th>
<th aria-label="Caught Stealing" class=" center" data-stat="CS" data-tip="Caught Stealing">CS</th>

<th aria-label="Batting Average" class=" hide_non_quals center" data-filter="1" data-name="Batting Average" data-stat="batting_avg" data-tip='<strong>Hits/At Bats</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played<br>Bold indicates highest BA using current stats<br><span class="all_time_record">Gold</span> means awarded title at end of year.'>BA</th>
<th aria-label="On-Base%" class=" hide_non_quals center" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base%" data-stat="onbase_perc" data-tip="<strong>(H + BB + HBP)/(At Bats + BB + HBP + SF)</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played">OBP</th>
<th aria-label="Slugging %" class=" hide_non_quals center" data-filter="1" data-name="Slugging %" data-stat="slugging_perc" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases/At Bats or <br>(1B + 2*2B + 3*3B + 4*HR)/AB</strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played">SLG</th>
<th aria-label="On-Base Plus Slugging" class=" hide_non_quals center" data-filter="1" data-name="On-Base Plus Slugging" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging" data-tip="<strong>On-Base + Slugging Percentages </strong><br>For recent years, leaders need 3.1 PA<br>per team game played">OPS</th>
<th aria-label="Adjusted OPS+" class=" hide_non_quals center" data-stat="onbase_plus_slugging_plus" data-tip="<strong>OPS+</strong><br>100*[OBP/lg OBP + SLG/lg SLG - 1]<br>Adjusted to the player&#x2019;s ballpark(s)">OPS+</th>
<th aria-label="Total Bases" class=" center" data-stat="TB" data-tip="<strong>Total Bases</strong><br>Singles + 2 x Doubles + 3 x Triples + 4 x Home Runs.">TB</th>
<th aria-label="Double Plays Grounded Into" class=" center" data-stat="GIDP" data-tip="<strong>Double Plays Grounded Into</strong><br>Only includes standard 6-4-3, 4-3, etc. double plays.<br>First tracked in 1933.<br>For gamelogs only in seasons we have play-by-play, we include triple plays as well.<br>All official seasonal totals do not include GITP's.">GDP</th>
<th aria-label="Hit By Pitch" class=" center" data-stat="HBP" data-tip="Times Hit by a Pitch.">HBP</th>
<th aria-label="Sacrifice Hits" class=" center" data-stat="SH" data-tip="Sacrifice Hits (Sacrifice Bunts)">SH</th>
<th aria-label="Sacrifice Flies" class=" center" data-stat="SF" data-tip="<strong>Sacrifice Flies</strong><br>First tracked in 1954.">SF</th>
<th aria-label="Intentional Bases on Balls" class=" center" data-stat="IBB" data-tip="<strong>Intentional Bases on Balls</strong><br>First tracked in 1955.">IBB</th>
<th aria-label="Runners Left On Base" class=" center" data-stat="LOB" data-tip="Runners Left On Base">LOB</th>
</tr>

<div class="footer no_hide_long" id="tfooter_team_output">

<p class="note">
WAR and Wins Above Average are computed at the team/position level by
prorating the players' team-season totals by time played at the
position, so they may not represent exactly what the player did at
that position, but rather it assumes they were equally valued at each
position.  Fielding Runs is based on actual time at the position.</p>

<p class="note">You can convert WAR to a team record by taking wins = WAR +
.294*G and losses = G-wins. You can convert WAA to a team record by
taking wins = WAA + .5*G and losses = G-wins.
</p>

<p class="note">"All P" includes both pitching and batting while "SP" & "RP" include only pitching.</p>
</div>-->

      <tr class="thead">
         <th aria-label="Tm" data-stat="team_ID" class=" sort_default_asc show_partial_when_sorting center" >Tm</th>
         <th aria-label=" Number of Players used as Fielders " data-stat="fielders_used" class=" center" data-tip="<strong>Number of Players used as Fielders</strong>" >#Fld</th>
         <th aria-label="Runs Allowed/Game" data-stat="runs_allowed_per_game" class=" center" data-tip="Runs Allowed Per Game" >RA/G</th>
         <th aria-label=" Defensive Efficiency Percentage of balls in play converted into outs This is an estimate based on team defensive and pitching stats. We utilize two estimates of plays made. One using innings pitched, strikeouts, double plays and outfield assists. And the other with batters faced, strikeouts, hits allowed, walks allowed, hbp, and .71 * errors committed (avg percent of errors that result in an ROE) Total plays available are plays made + hits allowed - home runs + error committed estimate." data-stat="defensive_efficiency" class=" center" data-tip="<strong>Defensive Efficiency</strong><br>Percentage of balls in play converted into outs<br>This is an estimate based on team defensive and pitching stats.<br>We utilize two estimates of plays made.<br>One using innings pitched, strikeouts, double plays and outfield assists.<br>And the other with batters faced, strikeouts, hits allowed, walks allowed, hbp, and .71 * errors committed (avg percent of errors that result in an ROE)<br>Total plays available are plays made + hits allowed - home runs + error committed estimate." >DefEff</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Played" data-stat="G" class=" center" data-tip="Games Played or Pitched" >G</th>
         <th aria-label="Games Started" data-stat="GS" class=" center" data-tip="Games Started" >GS</th>
         <th aria-label="Complete Games" data-stat="CG" class=" center" data-tip="Complete Game" >CG</th>
         <th aria-label="Innings Played" data-stat="Inn_def" class=" center" data-tip="Innings Played in Field" >Inn</th>
         <th aria-label="Defensive ChancesPutouts + Assists + Errors" data-stat="chances" class=" center" data-tip="<strong>Defensive Chances</strong><br>Putouts + Assists + Errors" >Ch</th>
         <th aria-label="Putouts" data-stat="PO" class=" center" data-tip="Putouts" >PO</th>
         <th aria-label="Assists" data-stat="A" class=" center" data-tip="Assists" >A</th>
         <th aria-label="Errors Committed" data-stat="E_def" class=" center" data-tip="Errors Committed" >E</th>
         <th aria-label="Double Plays Turned" data-stat="DP_def" class=" center" data-tip="Double Plays Turned" >DP</th>
         <th aria-label="Fielding %" data-stat="fielding_perc" class=" center" data-tip="<strong>Fielding Percentage</strong><br>(Putouts + Assists) / (Putouts + Assists + Errors)" data-filter="1" data-name="Fielding %" >Fld%</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Zone Runs (s.1953)" data-stat="tz_runs_total" class=" center" data-tip="<strong>Total Zone Total Fielding Runs Above Avg</strong><br>The number of runs above or below average the player was worth based on the number of plays made.<br>This number combines the R<em>tz</em>, R<em>dp</em>, R<em>of</em>, R<em>catch</em> numbers into a total defensive contribution.<br>See the <a href="/about/total_zone.shtml">glossary section</a> for a more complete explanation.<br><em>Provided by BaseballProjection.com</em>" >Rtot</th>
         <th aria-label=" Total Zone Total Fielding Runs Above Avg per 1,200 Inn The number of runs above or below average the fielder was worth per 1,200 Innings (approx 135 games). This number combines the R tz , R dp , R of , R catch numbers into a total defensive contribution. See the <a href="/about/total_zone.shtml">glossary section for a more complete explanation. Provided by BaseballProjection.com " data-stat="tz_runs_total_per_season" class=" center" data-tip="<strong>Total Zone Total Fielding Runs Above Avg per 1,200 Inn</strong><br>The number of runs above or below average the fielder was worth per 1,200 Innings (approx 135 games).<br>This number combines the R<em>tz</em>, R<em>dp</em>, R<em>of</em>, R<em>catch</em> numbers into a total defensive contribution.<br>See the <a href="/about/total_zone.shtml">glossary section</a> for a more complete explanation.<br><em>Provided by BaseballProjection.com</em>" data-filter="1" data-name="<strong>Total Zone Total Fielding Runs Above Avg per 1,200 Inn</strong><br>The number of runs above or below average the fielder was worth per 1,200 Innings (approx 135 games).<br>This number combines the R<em>tz</em>, R<em>dp</em>, R<em>of</em>, R<em>catch</em> numbers into a total defensive contribution.<br>See the <a href="/about/total_zone.shtml">glossary section</a> for a more complete explanation.<br><em>Provided by BaseballProjection.com</em>" >Rtot/yr</th>
         <th aria-label=" BIS Defensive Runs Saved Above Avg The number of runs above or below average the team was worth based on the number of plays made. This number combines the individual players' defensive runs saved as well as team-level runs saved from shifting and positioning into a total team defensive contribution. Provided by Baseball Info Solutions " data-stat="bis_runs_total_team" class=" center" data-tip="<strong>BIS Defensive Runs Saved Above Avg</strong><br>The number of runs above or below average the team was worth based on the number of plays made.<br>This number combines the individual players' defensive runs saved as well as team-level runs saved from shifting and positioning into a total team defensive contribution.<br><em>Provided by Baseball Info Solutions</em>" >Rdrs</th>
         <th aria-label=" BIS Defensive Runs Saved Above Avg per 1,200 Inn The number of runs above or below average the team's fielders were worth per 1,200 Innings (approx 135 games). This number combines the R pm , R bdp , R bof , R bcatch numbers into a total defensive contribution. For pitchers, this is set to 200 Innings. This does not include any team-level runs saved from positioning or shifting. Provided by Baseball Info Solutions " data-stat="bis_runs_total_per_season_team" class=" center" data-tip="<strong>BIS Defensive Runs Saved Above Avg per 1,200 Inn</strong><br>The number of runs above or below average the team's fielders were worth per 1,200 Innings (approx 135 games).<br>This number combines the R<em>pm</em>, R<em>bdp</em>, R<em>bof</em>, R<em>bcatch</em> numbers into a total defensive contribution.<br>For pitchers, this is set to 200 Innings.<br>This does not include any team-level runs saved from positioning or shifting.<br><em>Provided by Baseball Info Solutions</em>" data-filter="1" data-name="<strong>BIS Defensive Runs Saved Above Avg per 1,200 Inn</strong><br>The number of runs above or below average the team's fielders were worth per 1,200 Innings (approx 135 games).<br>This number combines the R<em>pm</em>, R<em>bdp</em>, R<em>bof</em>, R<em>bcatch</em> numbers into a total defensive contribution.<br>For pitchers, this is set to 200 Innings.<br>This does not include any team-level runs saved from positioning or shifting.<br><em>Provided by Baseball Info Solutions</em>" >Rdrs/yr</th>
         <th aria-label=" BIS Good Plays/Misplays Runs Above Avg The number of runs above or below average the player was worth based on plays where they made an exceptional contribution or obviously misplayed the situation.
